structuredData.organizationDescription: Binbang is a vacancy alert service that monitors accommodation booking sites and sends email notifications when a room becomes available.
structuredData.websiteDescription: Vacancy alert service for accommodation booking sites. Get notified when a room becomes available.

step1.title: Get started with Binbang
step1.body: Register accommodations to receive KakaoTalk alerts when a vacancy appears.

step2.title: Add your first accommodation
step2.body: Add a URL from Airbnb, Agoda, etc. and we'll check availability for you.

step3.title: KakaoTalk alerts
step3.body: Connect your Kakao account to receive instant alerts when a vacancy is found.

step4.title: All set!
step4.body: We'll monitor availability 24/7. Sit back and relax!
